title: Executive Order 7994-Modification of Okefenokee Wildlife Refuge
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States, it is ordered that the Okefenokee Wildlife Refuge in Georgia, established by Executive Order No. 7593 of March 30, 1937 (2 F.R. 627), be, and it is hereby, modified by excluding therefrom the following described lands:
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7994-Modification of Okefenokee Wildlife Refuge Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/210562
